### Request for Proposal: Task-Based Professional Services (TSPS)

**noticeNumber-numeroAvis**: 5000068950  
**pubDate-datePublication**: 2023-01-16  
**closingTime-dateClotureOffres**: 2023-02-15T14:00:00

**noticeType-avisType-fra**: Demande de propositions (DP)  
**gsin-en nibs**: R019F  
**gsinDescription-nibsDescription-fra**: Services de consultation.

*World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

### Requestor Information
- **contractingAuthority**: Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC)  
- **contactInfo**:  
  Marie-Christine Blais  
  marie-christine.blais@ec.gc.ca  
  5143632949

### Requirement Description
ECCC’s Digital Strategies & Information Management Directorate (DSIM) requires the services of a Senior Procurement Specialist to provide strategic advice and ongoing support for various procurement processes, to both internal and external clients of DSIM to support of IM/IT initiatives. The requirement is subject to the provisions of the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)”, “the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the “Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Bidding Details
The Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) method of supply is subject to quarterly refresh cycles. The expected period of contract will be from April 1, 2023, to March 31, 2024, with an irrevocable option to extend the resulting contract term by up to four (4) additional one (1) year periods under the same conditions. For all information concerning this request, communicate directly with Carolyne Chenier, contract authority.

### Invitation to Tender
Pre-qualified respondents who possess relevant experience and qualifications are invited to submit proposals. The procurement process is a competitive, limited tender, and respondents who are interested in this opportunity should contact SPTS
